full_summary:
## Enterprise Architecture Software Solution
### Solicitation Details
* **Reference Number**: WS3859756665-Doc3899079559
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3859756665
* **Publication Date**: 2023-03-28
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-04-12T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Contract Effective Date**: 2023-06-01
* **Contract End Date**: N/A
### Offer and Deliverables
The Government of Canada invites bids for an Enterprise Architecture Software Solution (EASS) to support its evolving digital needs. The required solution must be compatible with the QualiWare product and its corresponding metamodel content. Key deliverables include:
* Maintenance and support of existing EASS licenses
* Acquisition of additional licenses
* Professional services
* Training and support

### Procurement Details
* **Trade Agreements**: Eligible under various free trade agreements, including the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Dean, Michael (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [michael.dean@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michael.dean@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15577354?extsite=MTU1NzczNTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15577354?extsite=MTU1NzczNTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Attachment**: None
### Name and Address of Contracting Authority
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)  
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage  
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada  
### Name and Address of End-User Entity
Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)
